title: What Time Will Cross Release on Prime Video? Release Schedule Explained
description: Fans are wondering about the release date and time of Cross on Prime Video. The upcoming series has everyone excited for a fresh take on author James Patterson’s iconic character, Alex Cross. With Aldis Hodge in the lead role, this crime-thriller series dives into the life of a seasoned D.C. detective and forensic psychologist, Alex […] The post What Time Will Cross Release on Prime Video? Release Schedule Explained appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Areeba Masood
excerpt: Wondering about the release date, time, and episode schedule of Cross on Prime Video? Here's everything you need to know about the new show.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Fans are wondering about the release date and time of Cross on Prime Video. The upcoming series has everyone excited for a fresh take on author James Patterson’s iconic character, Alex Cross. With Aldis Hodge in the lead role, this crime-thriller series dives into the life of a seasoned D.C. detective and forensic psychologist, Alex Cross, as he confronts personal challenges and intense cases. Apart from the thrilling narrative of Cross, viewers also wish to learn about its release schedule. Here’s everything to know about when you can catch Cross on Prime Video. When does Cross Season 1 come out on Prime Video? Cross Season 1 premieres on Prime Video on November 14, 2024, at 12 AM PT. The show will allow fans of the Alex Cross novels to see a reimagined version of the beloved character. Its storyline spans across a total of 8 episodes. Viewers can binge the season at their own pace, immersing themselves fully in Alex Cross’s high-stakes battles and unraveling mysteries without the wait. Aldis Hodge, known for his roles in Black Adam and Hidden Figures, brings a unique depth to Alex Cross, showcasing both his sharp investigative skills and personal struggles​. Cross’ Prime Video Release Schedule Explained The series will not follow a weekly release model. Unlike traditional releases, Prime Video will make all eight episodes of Cross available altogether at the same date and time. Here’s the episode list that will release altogether: Episode 1: Pilot Episode 2: Ride the White Horsey Episode 3: The Good Book Episode 4: Masks Episode 5: What Happens at Ramsey’s Episode 6: A Bang, Not a Whimper Episode 7: Happy Birthday Episode 8: You Had Me at Motherf****r By offering the entire series on November 14, the show provides viewers the option to binge-watch, giving a comprehensive look at its characters and story. Prime Video’s decision to drop all episodes at once also aligns with their recent release trend for high-stakes drama series, aiming to captivate viewers who prefer uninterrupted storytelling.
html:
Fans are wondering about the release date and time of Cross on Prime Video. The upcoming series has everyone excited for a fresh take on author James Patterson’s iconic character, Alex Cross. With Aldis Hodge in the lead role, this crime-thriller series dives into the life of a seasoned D.C. detective and forensic psychologist, Alex Cross, as he confronts personal challenges and intense cases. Apart from the thrilling narrative of Cross, viewers also wish to learn about its release schedule.

Here’s everything to know about when you can catch Cross on Prime Video.

When does Cross Season 1 come out on Prime Video?

Cross Season 1 premieres on Prime Video on November 14, 2024, at 12 AM PT.

The show will allow fans of the Alex Cross novels to see a reimagined version of the beloved character. Its storyline spans across a total of 8 episodes. Viewers can binge the season at their own pace, immersing themselves fully in Alex Cross’s high-stakes battles and unraveling mysteries without the wait.

Aldis Hodge, known for his roles in Black Adam and Hidden Figures, brings a unique depth to Alex Cross, showcasing both his sharp investigative skills and personal struggles​.

Cross’ Prime Video Release Schedule Explained

The series will not follow a weekly release model. Unlike traditional releases, Prime Video will make all eight episodes of Cross available altogether at the same date and time.

Here’s the episode list that will release altogether:

  • Episode 1: Pilot
  • Episode 2: Ride the White Horsey
  • Episode 3: The Good Book
  • Episode 4: Masks
  • Episode 5: What Happens at Ramsey’s
  • Episode 6: A Bang, Not a Whimper
  • Episode 7: Happy Birthday
  • Episode 8: You Had Me at Motherf****r

By offering the entire series on November 14, the show provides viewers the option to binge-watch, giving a comprehensive look at its characters and story. Prime Video’s decision to drop all episodes at once also aligns with their recent release trend for high-stakes drama series, aiming to captivate viewers who prefer uninterrupted storytelling.
